headline.main: VIRGINIA TO GET BACK A CIVIL WAR TROPHY; Great Seal of Fairfax County Was Captured by Union Soldier

lead_paragraph: GREENWICH, Conn., Nov. 3 -- Mrs. Ira Walton Henry of Old Greenwich will return the "great seal" of Fairfax County, Va., to representatives from that State at a luncheon in the Pickwick Arms Hotel here Saturday, Nov. 8, at 1 P.M.
abstract: Plans to return Fairfax County, Va, seal captured by Union soldier
snippet: GREENWICH, Conn., Nov. 3 -- Mrs. Ira Walton Henry of Old Greenwich will return the "great seal" of Fairfax County, Va., to representatives from that State at a luncheon in the Pickwick Arms Hotel here Saturday, Nov. 8, at 1 P.M....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
